languages.text: "В отсутствие Вашей Светлости на меня легло бремя заботы о безопасности казны династии. Джай Хейдари считалась мной наиболее вероятной угрозой ее целостности. Мои люди предприняли расследование и установили связь, имевшую место в прошлом, между Хейдари и персоной по имени Пощада — весьма влиятельной фигурой в Миссии Касбаллики, обладающей опасной репутацией".

"In Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s absence, the burden of watching over the dynasty's treasury fell upon my shoulders. I deemed Jae Heydari the likeliest threat to the dynasty's material security. I had my people conduct an investigation, and they uncovered a past connection between Heydari and an individual by the name of Mercy, a highly influential figure in the Kasballica Mission with a dangerous reputation."
languages.original_text: "В отсутствие Вашей Светлости на меня легло бремя заботы о безопасности казны династии. Джай Хейдари считалась мной наиболее вероятной угрозой ее целостности. Мои люди предприняли расследование и установили связь, имевшую место в прошлом, между Хейдари и персоной по имени Пощада — весьма влиятельной фигурой в Миссии Касбаллики, обладающей опасной репутацией".

I deemed Jae Heydari the likeliest threat to the dynasty's material security. I had my people conduct an investigation, and they uncovered a past connection between Heydari and an individual by the name of Mercy, a highly influential figure in the Kasballica Mission with a dangerous reputation."

I had my people conduct an investigation, and they uncovered a past connection between Heydari and an individual by the name of Mercy, a highly influential figure in the Kasballica Mission with a dangerous reputation."

"In Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s absence, the burden of watching over the dynasty's treasury fell upon my shoulders. I deemed Jae Heydari the likeliest threat to the dynasty's material security. I had my people conduct an investigation, and they uncovered a past connection between Heydari and an individual by the name of Mercy, a highly influential figure in the Kasballica Mission with a dangerous reputation."

languages.text: “大人，当您不在的时候，监管王朝国库的重任就落在了我的肩上。我认为婕伊·海达利最有可能会威胁到王朝的财产安全，于是我让我的人进行了调查。他们发现海达利曾与一个名叫‘悯慈’的人有联系。这个人在卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团中极具影响力，而且声名狼藉。”
languages.original_text: "In Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s absence, the burden of watching over the dynasty's treasury fell upon my shoulders. I deemed Jae Heydari the likeliest threat to the dynasty's material security. I had my people conduct an investigation, and they uncovered a past connection between Heydari and an individual by the name of Mercy, a highly influential figure in the Kasballica Mission with a dangerous reputation."

traits.locale_text: “大人，当您不在的时候，监管王朝国库的重任就落在了我的肩上。我认为婕伊·海达利最有可能会威胁到王朝的财产安全，于是我让我的人进行了调查。他们发现海达利曾与一个名叫‘悯慈’的人有联系。这个人在卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团中极具影响力，而且声名狼藉。”

languages.text: 「陛下がご不在の間、王朝のコッコを監視するよう命じられました。私は、ジェイ・ヘイダリが王朝の安全確保において最たる脅威であると考えたのです。部下に調査を行わせたところ、ヘイダリとマーシーという人物の間に過去に繋がりがあることがわかりました。マーシーは、カスバリカ聖務団で大きな影響力を持ち、危うい評判を得ている人物です」
languages.original_text: "In Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s absence, the burden of watching over the dynasty's treasury fell upon my shoulders. I deemed Jae Heydari the likeliest threat to the dynasty's material security. I had my people conduct an investigation, and they uncovered a past connection between Heydari and an individual by the name of Mercy, a highly influential figure in the Kasballica Mission with a dangerous reputation."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下がご不在の間、王朝のコッコを監視するよう命じられました。私は、ジェイ・ヘイダリが王朝の安全確保において最たる脅威であると考えたのです。部下に調査を行わせたところ、ヘイダリとマーシーという人物の間に過去に繋がりがあることがわかりました。マーシーは、カスバリカ聖務団で大きな影響力を持ち、危うい評判を得ている人物です」

languages.text: «En ausencia de {mf|milord|milady}, la tarea de vigilar la tesorería de la dinastía recaía sobre mis hombros. Consideré que Jae Heydari era la amenaza más probable para la estabilidad financiera de la dinastía. Encargué a mi gente que la investigara y descubrieron una relación entre Heydari y un individuo conocido como Mercy, una figura influyente en la misión Kasballica con una reputación peligrosa».
languages.original_text: "In Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s absence, the burden of watching over the dynasty's treasury fell upon my shoulders. I deemed Jae Heydari the likeliest threat to the dynasty's material security. I had my people conduct an investigation, and they uncovered a past connection between Heydari and an individual by the name of Mercy, a highly influential figure in the Kasballica Mission with a dangerous reputation."

traits.locale_text: «En ausencia de {mf|milord|milady}, la tarea de vigilar la tesorería de la dinastía recaía sobre mis hombros. Consideré que Jae Heydari era la amenaza más probable para la estabilidad financiera de la dinastía. Encargué a mi gente que la investigara y descubrieron una relación entre Heydari y un individuo conocido como Mercy, una figura influyente en la misión Kasballica con una reputación peligrosa».

languages.text: « En l'absence de Votre Seigneurie, c'est à moi qu'il incombait de surveiller le trésor de la dynastie et j'ai estimé que Jae Heydari était la menace la plus probable envers notre sécurité matérielle. J'ai demandé à mes hommes de mener l'enquête, et ils ont découvert un lien entre Heydari et un individu du nom de Mercy, un membre particulièrement influent de la Mission de la Kasballica à la réputation inquiétante. »
languages.original_text: "In Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s absence, the burden of watching over the dynasty's treasury fell upon my shoulders. I deemed Jae Heydari the likeliest threat to the dynasty's material security. I had my people conduct an investigation, and they uncovered a past connection between Heydari and an individual by the name of Mercy, a highly influential figure in the Kasballica Mission with a dangerous reputation."

traits.locale_text: « En l'absence de Votre Seigneurie, c'est à moi qu'il incombait de surveiller le trésor de la dynastie et j'ai estimé que Jae Heydari était la menace la plus probable envers notre sécurité matérielle. J'ai demandé à mes hommes de mener l'enquête, et ils ont découvert un lien entre Heydari et un individu du nom de Mercy, un membre particulièrement influent de la Mission de la Kasballica à la réputation inquiétante. »

languages.text: "In Abwesenheit Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} wurde mir die Bürde übertragen, über die Schatzkammer der Dynastie zu wachen. Ich schätzte Jae Heydari als wahrscheinlichste Bedrohung ein, was die materielle Sicherheit der Dynastie betrifft. Ich leitete eine Untersuchung ein und meine Leute fanden heraus, dass es früher eine Verbindung zwischen Heydari und einer Person namens Mercy gab, einer sehr einflussreichen Gestalt in der Kasballica mit äußerst zweifelhaftem Ruf."
languages.original_text: "In Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s absence, the burden of watching over the dynasty's treasury fell upon my shoulders. I deemed Jae Heydari the likeliest threat to the dynasty's material security. I had my people conduct an investigation, and they uncovered a past connection between Heydari and an individual by the name of Mercy, a highly influential figure in the Kasballica Mission with a dangerous reputation."

traits.locale_text: "In Abwesenheit Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} wurde mir die Bürde übertragen, über die Schatzkammer der Dynastie zu wachen. Ich schätzte Jae Heydari als wahrscheinlichste Bedrohung ein, was die materielle Sicherheit der Dynastie betrifft. Ich leitete eine Untersuchung ein und meine Leute fanden heraus, dass es früher eine Verbindung zwischen Heydari und einer Person namens Mercy gab, einer sehr einflussreichen Gestalt in der Kasballica mit äußerst zweifelhaftem Ruf."

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin yokluğunda, hanedanlığın hazinesine göz kulak olma sorumluluğu benim omuzlarımdaydı. Jae Heydari'yi, hanedanlığın maddi güvenliği konusunda en muhtemel tehdit olarak görüyordum. Adamlarıma bir inceleme yaptırdım ve geçmişte, Heydari ile Kasballica Misyonu'ndaki son derece büyük nüfuza ve tehlikeli bir nama sahip Merhamet ismindeki şahıs arasında bir bağlantı olduğunu keşfettiler."
languages.original_text: "In Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s absence, the burden of watching over the dynasty's treasury fell upon my shoulders. I deemed Jae Heydari the likeliest threat to the dynasty's material security. I had my people conduct an investigation, and they uncovered a past connection between Heydari and an individual by the name of Mercy, a highly influential figure in the Kasballica Mission with a dangerous reputation."
